sentences.english: The city is noted for its handicrafts. Population, 745,000.

sentences.english: Our company produce a lot of specifications Bamboo, for crafts, papermaking, and so on.

sentences.english: Egg carving handicraft and iron handicraft are the most important two types of product of the company.

sentences.english: Etsy remains one of the easiest places to sell crafts.

sentences.english: Particularly suitable for plastic coatings , automotive refinish coatings , car-accessories coatings , art-craft coatings , etc.

sentences.english: It plans to develop the handicraft industry in the area alongside Guoji Road.

sentences.english: I'm Liu Mei, from Shanghai Crafts& Arts Import& Export Corporation. I’ve come to meet you.

sentences.english: It is not only a craftwork but also have practicality.

sentences.english: According to our experience， these handicrafts can find a ready market in Japan.

sentences.english: Manufacturing activities are limited to fruit-processing, clothing, and handicrafts.

sentences.english: There is some artware set out in the room.
